vulnerability.name: USN-4236-3
vulnerability.description: USN-4236-1 fixed a vulnerability in Libgcrypt. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that Libgcrypt was susceptible to a ECDSA timing attack.  An attacker could possibly use this attack to recover sensitive  information.

statements.status_notes: Libgcrypt could be made to expose sensitive information. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
